p: The viability of cells was monitored with resazurin. Melanoma cells, B16F10, were seeded in 96-well plate. After 24 h cells treated with different concentrations (0.2-200 Î¼g/mL) of P. atlantica subsp. mutica extracts, results showed that the extracts had no significant cytotoxic effect on B16F10 cells at the concentrations used in this study ( Fig. 1). Doxorubicin as the positive control significantly induced cell death ( P < 0.05).
